quotes.quote: I'm not a nerd. I am a computer literate man.
Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica.
I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
Sometimes I'll start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going.
I declare bankruptcy!
I am ready to compete.
I am Beyoncé always.
Dwight, you ignorant slut!
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica.
I'm not a role model. Because I quit a job. That's what I did.
Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both.
You know what they say — easy as taking Kevin's wallet from his pants.
I am running away from my problems, and my whole life is in this briefcase.
I am not a salesman. I am a paper sales rep.
Do I want to be the world's best salesman? No, I want to be the best in Scranton.
If I had a gun with two bullets and I was in a room with Hitler, Bin Laden, and Toby, I would shoot Toby, then take one bullet for myself.

I have a dream that my four, not one, not nine, four, moderately attractive, intelligent men will one day live in a land where they are judged by the content of their character, and not by the content of their pants.
I am fast. To give you a reference point, I'm somewhere between a snake and a mongoose... and a ninja
I am not a crook. I am not a criminal. My one misstep was trying to help a friend.
I am an early bird and I’m wormin’.
I have a theory about the human mind, but it's not complete.
I am not a role model.
I am the assistant to the regional manager.
I am not a bad guy.
I am not related to any of the other Halperts.
I am the world's best salesman.
I am the best negotiator in the office.
I am not a nerd. I am a computer literate man.
